metadata.name: Twisted Beauty
metadata.description:
Beauty comes in many forms. 

The light of the sun illuminates a rare, elegant tornado as it dances across the field, full of life and wonder. 

Captured on my Nikon D800 near Ashby, Minnesota on July 8th, 2021.

Collection Description: 
Art of The Storm

The sky is a blank canvas for the most powerful art of Mother Nature. Storms are majestic and beautiful while also ominous and destructive. They are the ultimate representation of the Yin & Yang, the balance between light & dark. We can never tame Mother Nature, we can only bear witness to her strength and her beauty.

This is a collection of some of my fine art style storm photographs from 20 years of documenting severe weather.

10% donated to "Girls Who Chase" initiative. Empowering & inspiring women & girls to pursue the weather, the sciences, and their passions.
